analysis_racial: The racial rationale in this job posting is neutral, as it does not favour any racial group and uses unbiased language. The company states its commitment to providing a diverse and inclusive workplace, but does not include any specific examples or terms that may be seen as biased towards or against any particular racial group.
text:
Job Title: Program Manager - Collaboration Technology Group
Company: Taylor-Perry

About Us:
Taylor-Perry is a leading technology firm dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that transform the way our clients work. Our Collaboration Technology Group is seeking a talented Program Manager to join our team.

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Program Manager to lead the development and implementation of collaboration technology initiatives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in program management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute program plans to achieve business objectives
- Collaborate with stakeholders to identify business needs and develop solutions
- Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure successful delivery
- Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
- At least 5 years of experience in program management
- Proven track record of delivering large-scale technology initiatives
- Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Taylor-Perry is an equal opportunities employer and is committed to providing a diverse and inclusive workplace.

{"position": "Program Manager- Collaboration Technology Group", "inference_time": 15.6823508739, "prompt_tokens": 574, "completion_tokens": 328, "total_tokens": 902, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Taylor-Perry\nRole: Program Manager- Collaboration Technology Group\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Neutral, language is unbiased and does not favour any racial group. Examples are:\n    - A child born to an undocumented immigrant is eligible for support..\n    - Advanced level of Spanish proficiency..\n    - Inclusive policies for American Indians and Native Americans..\n    - Equal opportunities for all candidates are provided..\n    - The company culture supports diversity and inclusion.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "Here is the generated job posting:

Job Title: Program Manager - Collaboration Technology Group
Company: Taylor-Perry

About Us:
Taylor-Perry is a leading technology firm dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that transform the way our clients work. Our Collaboration Technology Group is seeking a talented Program Manager to join our team.

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Program Manager to lead the development and implementation of collaboration technology initiatives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in program management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute program plans to achieve business objectives
- Collaborate with stakeholders to identify business needs and develop solutions
- Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure successful delivery
- Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
- At least 5 years of experience in program management
- Proven track record of delivering large-scale technology initiatives
- Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Taylor-Perry is an equal opportunities employer and is committed to providing a diverse and inclusive workplace.

</j>

<racial>The racial rationale in this job posting is neutral, as it does not favour any racial group and uses unbiased language.
